Rising Stars

http://www.risingstars-uk.com/

Rising Stars is an educational publishing company that has come a long way. Since our first books were published in 2002 there has been huge investment in education and as a result we have been able to develop an award-winning range of books, teaching resources and software that support teachers and learners in the UK and across the world. We are very proud of what we have achieved.

All of our products are created with teachers and learners (who always know best). We are confident that every resource we produce will make a difference to children’s learning and we are delighted that you have taken the time to come and browse our website; we hope that you enjoy it!

On 1st January 2015 Rising Stars joined Hodder Education. You can read more about this exciting news, and enjoy a wealth of other helpful articles, over on our blog.

  • See the Rising Stars research page.
  • For more information (and some free stuff!) visit the Rising Stars website.
